scripts.start:web: cd web; dotenv -- cross-var npm run dev -- --mode dev --host --port %WEB_PORT%
scripts.start:api: export $(grep -v '^#' .env | xargs) && cd api; dotenv -- cross-var uvicorn app.main:app --host 0.0.0.0 --port %API_PORT% --reload
scripts.start: npm run start:web & npm run start:api & npm run start:db

name: family-planner
description: ## Overview The Family Planner and Tracker App is designed to help families coordinate and track their weekly activities. The app consists of a backend API and a frontend web application.
